## Implementation Guidelines
This is a fallback template. Normally, the supervisor injects feature-specific context.
### If You're Here
1. Read `{{APP_SPEC_PATH}}` to understand the project 2. Query database for features: `opencode-forger db stats` 3. Run {{REGRESSION_SAMPLE_SIZE}} passing feature verification(s) to confirm no regressions 4. Implement ONE pending feature 5. Output `===SESSION_COMPLETE===` when done
